title: The Left Doubles Down on ‘Cuties’ Pedo Agenda! | Ep 44
description: Steven covers the #BlackLivesMatter riots in Lancaster as well as the atrocious Los Angeles cop ambush. Then he turns to look at Joe Biden’s complete inability to function without a teleprompter. Finally, we have the latest developments in the drama surrounding Netflix’s "Cuties" and California's Democratic governor signing a bill to lower penalties for adults who have sex with minors.
